text: Hi Harris - Thank you, yes I would love to connect. I would like to ask if the current data sync offering by various services is "good enough".  Are customers using the integration for to simply sync customer/contacts data or they are syncing more financial data like invoices, payments, products value, inventory etc to HubSpot.

Good day everyone,

Do you know if the following is possible.
We have a customer that would like to do an integration between HubSpot and a third party Software.
With this integration the customer is looking to sync 200 records of a custom object to a single file on their platform.
Has anyone done something like this before?
NVM figured this out, its because the search api limits results to 10,000.

I work on a tool for <https://blog.sequin.io/HubSpot-to-postgres/|syncing HubSpot data to Postgres>; some of the same principles will apply. A _file_ seems like an inefficient interface between the two systems, no?

Hello everyone,

One of our clients is interested in creating an automated email subscription for when a pre-owned vehicle listing page is updated. To my knowledge, the only automated subscription email is for a blog. Is it possible to achieve this for a web page update? Or, is it perhaps possible with a HubDB table update?

Thank you for your help and insight!
*Urgent*: Anyone knows how come all the coding texts changed to white when I opened the file today.
Does it affect the site?
Honestly HubSpot syntax detection is really bad, so sometimes it will think somethings a comment even when it clearing isn't
So far no affection spotted
Yep then I think it's just the syntax detection glitching
It was so terrifying. Hope the glitch will be solved soon.
It probably won't be solved unless you report it
Actually, I have reported it. They are on it now but who knows how long is gonna take.
Thanks for reporting, I also hope it will be solved
Thank you for the quick respond. You answer is a big relief.
Hey all, any recommendations on integrations that can send linkedin connection requests as a workflow action?
You can do this with a Custom code action
You obviously will need to generate an auth2 token though
How you even do this so fast is amazing. Thanks Carter!
No problem
I'm interested to see the usecases for this
I will definitely share if we implement :slightly_smiling_face: Basically just plan on using it as part of sales outreach when leads come in through a partnership channel.
Super cool
Honestly it’s likely because of how big the file is. Typically syntax highlighting, even in code editors, starts to fail when you get over a few thousand lines.
true true

Hello! We're trying to setup a custom quote template with a Scheduled Payments module and have hit a wall. When using the built in module at `@HubSpot/quote_payment_schedule.module` it properly allows scheduled payments to be enabled, but when using a directly cloned module, the option is disabled. Documentation only notes that it needs to be a custom template, which it is, and it works with the `@HubSpot` version. Could anything else be preventing us from using a cloned module? No changes are made except location `../modules/quote_payment_schedule.module`
If something like that ever happens to me I just copy in into vs code and see if it gives errors lol
That's smart I usually just publish it and if the site doesn't crash it's probably not something to worry about
this is the way

Or as we say it where I’m from…
> Ya gotta risk it for the biscuit
it just started happening today in almost all of our portals we manage. looks like HubSpot changed something
if you remove any of the comments in your file the issue goes away. so it seems like something is wrong with HubSpot reading comments
Dang yeah that's definitely a bummer.

Hey all, I just published my main.css file, which is referenced in my template via the `require_css`  directive. Was just wondering how long it should take for it to be served minified? Does this take some time or should it be near instantaneous?
Okay great, I will reach out and let you know. If you want to email me, I’m `<mailto:harris@introcrm.com|harris@introcrm.com>`

Hello
I have one query about product call in HubSpot landing page. How to show Magento product in HubSpot landing page ? Please guide me.
